author: Andrew Feinberg
title: Trump Claims He Can Override Governors' Stay-at-Home Orders With President's 'Total' Authority
description: The president claimed that the Constitution gives him the power to order governors to reopen their economies against the recommendations of their own public health experts.
content: President Donald Trump on Monday claimed that he has "total authority" to override state governors' stay-at-home orders if they conflict with his plan to reopen the country's economy by relaxing the social distancing measures meant to hinder the spread of COV… [+3558 chars]
